About Aura

Tim Hodge, Colonel (Retired), U.S. Army has dedicated his life to serving others. He devoted 30 years to the soldiers and families of our military through numerous positions of increasing responsibility. Assignments included teaching chemistry at the United States Military Academy (West Point), International Relations at 4 U.S. Embassies in South America, and Chief of Security Cooperation (international relations) with U.S. Army South at Ft. Sam Houston, Texas.

After retiring from the Army, Tim recognized that older adults needed an advocate. He believes that older adults can age better, where thriving is normal. With this in mind, he acquired and built Assisted Living Locators to help Seniors and their families find the best senior housing and care options around San Antonio. While helping clients, Tim discovered a significant need among a growing number of older adults. Many older adults are isolated from their adult children and have to manage their own affairs while facing age related diseases and decline. This inspired Tim to start Aura Senior Management, LLC in June of 2018. Tim is a Certified Senior Advisor (CSA)® and has a MS in Biology. He is also is professionally fluent in Spanish.

Tim is a Certified Senior Advisor (CSA)® and has a MS in Biology. He is also is professionally fluent in Spanish. Tim continues to live in San Antonio with his wife. They have 3 adult children and 3 grandchildren. Tim earned the Nation’s trust and confidence to lead soldiers, care for families and manage important programs. You can trust Tim to do the things you would do for your parents if you had the time or lived closer.
